synopsis.text:
Magic dominates the realms of two distinct continents, Eastern and Western, in a world unlike our own. The Western Continent, divided into north and south, is home to the enigmatic Snow Mountain tribe in the north and the thriving Daqin Empire in the south. Harnessing the power of magic, the Daqin Empire has vanquished countless foes and established a prosperous civilization.

Born into the Snow Mountain tribe with a forbidden demon physique, Bai Xiao embarks on a journey to the magic-rich southern continent to cultivate his powers and break the curse afflicting his beloved Qingyue. Despite the vast distances and Qingyue's amnesia, Bai Xiao's determination remains unwavering. Armed with an abundance of treasures, he ventures into the unknown, shocking the empire with his prodigious talent and audacious spirit.

As Bai Xiao's magical cultivation path unfolds, will he succeed in reuniting with Qingyue and rekindling their love? Only time will reveal the destiny of this extraordinary young man.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
